text:
Hi Prasad, 
At this point you cannot trigger record creator from custom cards, but that's something we are looking into. Looking at your custom card, it seems to be displaying filtered view of deals associated for this object. If that's right, there may be other methods we are working on that could help with this scenario.
yes <@U03FJQPSC0Y> I filtered the deals using deal API in custom CRM card. other methods means it's already existing functionality on HubSpot?
